---
title: "Monthly runoff LSTM"

This site contains information about the computational material used for the paper [Deep learning for monthly rainfall-runoff modelling: a comparison with classical rainfall-runoff modelling across Australia](https://doi.org).

![Exploratory dashboard for model comparison](./img/model_benchmarking_dashboard_output.png)

You will find instructions to [install the software environment and packages](./getting-set-up.qmd).
